headline: Deutsche Bank Puts “Catalyst Call: Sell” on Illinois Tool Works (ITW) Ahead of Q4
summary: Illinois Tool Works Inc. (NYSE:ITW) is included among the 13 Best Dividend Kings to Buy in 2026. On January 12, Deutsche Bank put a “Catalyst Call: Sell” on Illinois Tool Works Inc. (NYSE:ITW), pitching it as a short-term trade. The analyst said the stock’s recent underperformance likely isn’t over yet and could drag into the […]
